​Part of a video game design involves the use of one period of a sinusoidal function as the path that a spaceship will follow across a rectangular video screen. The video screen has a width of <math alttext="1000"><semantics><mn>1000</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> pixels and a height of <math alttext="600"><semantics><mn>600</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> pixels. The values <math alttext="x equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals 1000"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> represent the left and right sides of the screen, respectively. The values <math alttext="y equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="y equals 600"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>600</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> represent the bottom and top sides of the screen, respectively. 
The path of the spaceship begins on the left side of the screen, <math alttext="x equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and completes one period of a sinusoidal function by ending on the right side of the screen, <math alttext="x equals 1000"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. During its path, the spaceship reaches its minimum height of <math alttext="y equals 200"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> before reaching its maximum height of <math alttext="y equals 500"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>500</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. If <math alttext="y equals f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> models the path of the spaceship, which of the following could define <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?
